item.title: 机器学习笔记-1（定义、监督学习、无监督学习）
item.description: What is machine learning？ Arthur Samuel（1959）的定义 Machine Learning : Field of study that give computers the ability to learn without being explicitly programmed. 在进行特定编程情况下给予计算机学习能力的领域。 Sa
